default.title: Snapshot Mouse Pad
default.description: Speed up the workday with a constant reminder of a favorite memory, or warm up your home office with a family photo. Each mouse pad measures 9.25" x 7.75" and is made with high-density black foam and a tough, stain-resistant inter-woven cloth cover.

en_US.title: Snapshot Mouse Pad
en_US.description: Speed up the workday with a constant reminder of a favorite memory, or warm up your home office with a family photo. Each mouse pad measures 9.25" x 7.75" and is made with high-density black foam and a tough, stain-resistant inter-woven cloth cover.
